description: The jagged peaks of the Frostpeak range loom over the region. The air is thin and cold, and snow persists year-round on the higher slopes.
name: Frostpeak Mountains

crevasse_edge.description: The path skirts the edge of a deep, icy crevasse. A blast of freezing air rises from the depths, and the ground looks unstable.
crevasse_edge.name: Edge of a Crevasse

frozen_waterfall_base.description: A massive waterfall, frozen solid into shimmering blue ice, clings to the mountainside. The air here is intensely cold. It might be possible to climb the ice, but it looks dangerous.
frozen_waterfall_base.name: Frozen Waterfall

hidden_valley.description: Surprisingly sheltered from the harsh mountain weather, this small valley is lush and green. A clear stream runs through it, and unusual alpine flowers bloom.
hidden_valley.name: Verdant Hidden Valley

hidden_valley_descent.description: A narrow cleft between rocks, easily missed, leads down from the summit into a sheltered area. Warmer air drifts up from below.
hidden_valley_descent.name: Descent into Shadow

high_pass.description: A narrow pass winds between towering peaks. The wind howls fiercely here, biting through your clothes. The path continues precariously upwards to the north.
high_pass.name: High Mountain Pass

ice_cave.description: Inside the ice cave, the temperature plummets. The air is still and silent. The ice walls glimmer, reflecting light in strange ways.
ice_cave.name: Glacial Cave

ice_cave_chamber.description: Deeper within the ice cave, the ice walls seem ancient and impossibly thick. Something large appears to be frozen within the ice in the center of the chamber.
ice_cave_chamber.name: Inner Ice Chamber

ice_cave_entrance.description: You've climbed halfway up the frozen waterfall to a ledge containing the entrance to a hidden cave formed entirely of ice.
ice_cave_entrance.name: Ice Cave Entrance

mine_exit.description: You emerge from a small hole in the mountainside, the exit of an old mine. The air is thin and cold. A narrow, treacherous path leads east along the cliff face.
mine_exit.name: Abandoned Mine Exit

rocky_ledge.description: A narrow ledge clings to the mountainside, offering a dizzying view of the valley below. Loose rocks make footing uncertain. The path continues east to a switchback.
rocky_ledge.name: Rocky Ledge

summit.description: The highest point for miles around. The view is breathtaking, stretching across forests, rivers, and distant lands. An ancient, weathered shrine stands here, half-buried in snow.
summit.name: Frostpeak Summit

switchback_1.description: The trail makes a sharp turn here, beginning a steep ascent upwards to the west.
switchback_1.name: Switchback Path

up.description: You are on a steep, winding path climbing the mountainside. You've gained significant elevation.
up.name: Steep Ascent

up_to_summit.description: The air is painfully thin here as you make the final climb to the summit. Every step is an effort.
up_to_summit.name: Final Ascent

valley_cave.description: A small, dry cave at the northern end of the hidden valley. Looks like it might have been used as a shelter recently.
valley_cave.name: Small Valley Cave
